title: Recipes
description: View and manage your saved recipes
noRecipesDescription: Recipe saved from chats will show up here
slashCommandDescription: Set a slash command to quickly run this recipe
slashCommandHint: Use /{{command}} in any chat to run this recipe
deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"?
deeplinkCopiedDescription: Recipe deeplink has been copied to clipboard
copyFailedDescription: Failed to copy deeplink to clipboard
scheduleRemovedDescription: Recipe will no longer run automatically
slashCommandRemovedDescription: Recipe slash command has been removed

createEditModal.createDescription: Create a new recipe to define agent behavior and capabilities.
createEditModal.editDescription: You can edit the recipe below to change the agent's behavior in a new session.
createEditModal.deeplinkHint: Copy this link to share with friends or paste directly in Chrome to open
createEditModal.failedToSaveAndRunRecipe: Failed to save and run recipe: {{error}}
createEditModal.fillRequiredFields: Please fill in all required fields and ensure JSON schema is valid.

parameter.unusedTooltip: This parameter is not used in the instructions or prompt. It will be available for manual input but may not be needed.
parameter.descriptionPlaceholder: E.g., "Enter the name for the new component"
parameter.descriptionHint: This is the message the end-user will see.
parameter.optionsHint: Enter each option on a new line. These will be shown as dropdown choices.

formFields.title: Title
formFields.descriptionPlaceholder: Brief description of what this recipe does
formFields.instructionsPlaceholder: Detailed instructions for the AI, hidden from the user...
formFields.instructionsHint: Use {{parameter_name}} to define parameters that users can fill in
formFields.initialPromptPlaceholder: Pre-filled prompt when the recipe starts...
formFields.parametersHint: Parameters will be automatically detected from {{parameter_name}} syntax in instructions/prompt/activities or you can manually add them below.
formFields.jsonSchemaHint: Define the expected structure of the AI's response using JSON Schema format

parameterModal.title: Recipe Parameters
parameterModal.cancelQuestion: What would you like to do?

import.title: Import Recipe
import.deeplinkHint: Paste a recipe deeplink starting with "agime://recipe?config="
import.fileHint: Upload a YAML or JSON file containing the recipe structure
import.reviewWarning: Ensure you review contents of recipe files before adding them to your AGIME interface.
import.schemaHint: Your YAML or JSON file should follow this structure. Required fields are: title, description, and either instructions or prompt.
import.noRecipeConfig: No recipe configuration found in deeplink
import.missingRequiredFields: Recipe is missing required fields (title, description)
import.missingInstructionsOrPrompt: Recipe must have either instructions or prompt
import.fileTooLarge: File is too large, max size is 1MB
import.deeplinkOrFileRequired: Either deeplink or recipe file are required

warning.newRecipeNote: You are about to execute a recipe that you haven't run before.
warning.trustSource: Only proceed if you trust the source of this recipe.
warning.hiddenCharacters: This recipe contains hidden characters that will be ignored for your safety, as they could be used for malicious purposes.
warning.title: Title:

scheduleFromRecipe.title: Create Schedule from Recipe
scheduleFromRecipe.description: Create a scheduled task using this recipe configuration.
scheduleFromRecipe.deeplinkHint: This link contains your recipe configuration and can be used to create a schedule.

createFromSession.title: Create Recipe from Session
createFromSession.description: Create a reusable recipe based on your current conversation.
createFromSession.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred while creating the recipe. Please try again.

activityEditor.title: Activities
activityEditor.description: The top-line prompts and activity buttons that will display in the recipe chat window.
activityEditor.messageDescription: A formatted message that will appear at the top of the recipe. Supports markdown formatting.
activityEditor.messagePlaceholder: Enter a user facing introduction message for your recipe (supports **bold**, *italic*, `code`, etc.)
activityEditor.activityButtonsDescription: Clickable buttons that will appear below the message to help users interact with your recipe.

instructionsEditor.title: Instructions Editor
instructionsEditor.label: Instructions
instructionsEditor.syntaxHint: Use {{parameter_name}} syntax to define parameters that users can fill in
instructionsEditor.placeholder: Detailed instructions for the AI, hidden from the user...
instructionsEditor.exampleText:
You are an AI assistant helping with {{task_type}}.

Please follow these steps:
1. Analyze the provided {{input_data}}
2. Apply the specified {{methodology}}
3. Generate a comprehensive report

Requirements:
- Be thorough and accurate
- Use clear, professional language
- Include specific examples where relevant
- Provide actionable recommendations

Format your response with:
- Executive summary
- Detailed analysis
- Key findings
- Next steps

Use {{parameter_name}} syntax for any user-provided values.

jsonSchemaEditor.title: JSON Schema Editor
jsonSchemaEditor.label: Response JSON Schema
jsonSchemaEditor.description: Define the expected structure of the AI's response using JSON Schema format

nameField.label: Recipe Name
nameField.formatHint: Will be automatically formatted (lowercase, dashes for spaces)
